subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Andy Pettitte, who went 14-8 with a 4.16 E.R.A. this year, signed on for another season with the Yankees for $11.75 million.
snippet: Andy Pettitte, who went 14-8 with a 4.16 E.R.A. this year, signed on for another season with the Yankees for $11.75 million.
